item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #445】SRE 周刊第 #445 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: FireHydrant has acquired Blameless! The addition of Blameless’ enterprise capabilities combined with FireHydrant’s platform creates the most comprehensive enterprise incident management solution in the market. https://firehydrant.com/blog/press-release-firehydrant-acquires-blameless-to-further-solidify-enterprise/ Hot Take: Don’t provide incident resolution estimates Providing incident resolution times to customers is an unneeded stress for responders with […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：FireHydrant 已收购 Blameless！ Blameless 的企业功能与 FireHydrant 的平台相结合，打造出了市场上最全面的企业事件管理解决方案。 https://firehydrant.com/blog/press-release-firehydrant-acquires-blameless-to-further-solidify-enterprise/ 热门观点：不提供事件解决估计 向客户提供事件解决时间对响应人员来说是不必要的压力和 […]
